document.full_text: christchurch, new zealand's second-largest city, faces up to 20 years of rebuilding as a result of an earthquake in february that destroyed one-third of its central business district.
document.title: south pacific: new zealand: christchurch facing 20 years of earthquake repairs
lines_and_colors: christchurch, new zealand's second-largest city, faces up to 20 years of rebuilding as a result of an earthquake in february that destroyed one-third of its central business district.
